name: Keep Your Distance (Jadua Studios)
description:
Warning - this game is still in it's EARLY ALPHA stages expect tons of bugs!

The launcher is currently being worked on, current users will need to re-install when the working version comes out! - Thanks for being patient! :)

In this game you are challenged to collect items. Not so bad right? But here's the challenge... You are infected! You must try not to infect the people who roam your world, don't make your virus spread!
